150230.Title: The Cruise
150230.title: The Cruise
150230.cast: Jan Himilsbach, Stanislaw Tym, Jerzy Dobrowolski, Zdzislaw Maklakiewicz, Andrzej Dobosz, Feridun Erol, Jolanta Lothe, Wanda Stanis≈Çawska-Lothe
150230.description: When the captain of a pleasant cruise ship mistakes a mischievous stowaway the entertainment director, wild and wacky hijinks ensue.
